On a night the ESPN camera panned over the always-funny “2017 National Champions” banner, UCF got embarrassed by a terrible Louisville team.
The Knights, who were 6.5-point favorite, led 14-7 at the… [+2248 chars]

articles.title: Rams 31-10 loss vs. Bills exposes SB champs, Josh Allen's four-TD performance | NFL | THE HERD - The Herd with Colin Cowherd
articles.description: The Buffalo Bills spoiled the Los Angeles Rams' Super Bowl banner reveal party with a dominating 31-10 win, something many fans did not expect. Josh Allen do...
